title: Drawing, "Design for a Coffee Pot", October 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper; verso: white and yellow pastel
markings: Stamp in black ink, center right: 44
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: CAFETIERE (C)/DIAMETRE 10 cms/HAUTEUR 14 cms 1/2; lower center right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/10.41; right of the handle: IVOIRE; right of the coffeepot: VERMEIL; in graphite, lower right: hormas de falsos con clave; lower left: [mathematical notations].
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Pear-shaped coffeepot with flared spout drawn in plan and elevation with an applied scalloped-edged lower body indicated in yellow pastel to be executed in vermeil. Hinged lid surmounted by a short stem-form finial and attached C-scroll handle indicated in white pastel to be executed in ivory. Raised on a short flaring foot. Placement of screws and hinge indicated by circles on finial and upper handle. Underdrawing in graphite of coffeepot in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Coffee Pot", October 1941.
October 1941. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper; verso: white and yellow pastel. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-70.
